resources.string:
Main Screen Help

 -Search Button: Will redirect you to search for a Recipe, Cuisine, Meal Types or Ingredients.

 -Create Button: Will redirect you to create a Recipe, Cuisine, Meal Types or Ingredients.

 -Favourites Button: Will redirect you to see your favourite recipes.

 -Shopping Cart Button: Will redirect you to see your current shopping cart, which contains ingredients added to the shopping cart.

Create or Edit Meal Type

 -Add a new Meal Type (Breakfast, Dinner, etc..) by specifying a name.

 -Save Button: Add or modify meal type.

 -Delete Button: Deletes meal type.

Create or Edit Cuisine

 -Add a new cuisine by specifying a name.

 -Save Button: Add or modify cuisine.

 -Delete Button: Deletes cuisine.

Create or Edit Ingredient

 -Add a new ingredient by specifying a name and its' price.

 -Modify an existing ingredient by clicking on the name or price.

 -Save Button: Add or modify ingredient.

 -Delete Button: Deletes ingredient.

Shopping Cart Screen Help

 This list will simplify your trip to the grocery store!

 When viewing a recipe, click the Add to Shopping Cart button and the ingredients will appear here.

 Check them off as you put them in your cart by click on the check box.

 Clear (X) Button: Will clear ingredients from your shopping cart.

Search Screen Help

 -Recipe Button: To find a Recipe.

 -Ingredient Button: To find an Ingredient.

 -Cuisine Button: To find a Cuisine.

 -Meal Button: To find a Meal Type.

Search Recipe Help Screen

 You can fill some or all of the following search fields.

 -Recipe Name Field: Search for recipes by their name.

 -Ingredients Field: Search for recipes by the ingredients in the recipes.

 -Meal Field: Search for recipes by the meal type(s) they are associated with. 

 -Cuisine Field: Search for recipes based on the cuisine type(s) they are associated with. 


 You can fill any field using boolean logic:

 -Multiple Items, use an 'and' in-between each item. ex: "Ham and egg"

 -Omit an Item, use a 'not' before the item to be omitted. ex: "Not egg"

 -Example using both: "Ham and not egg".
Search Meal Screen Help\n\n -Meal Type Field: Input which meal type to search here.
Search Cuisine Screen Help\n\n -Cuisine Name Field: Input which cuisine you would like to search for.
Search Ingredient Screen Help\n\n -Ingredient Name Field: Input which ingredient you would like to search for.

Create Screen Help

 -Recipe Button: Click to create a recipe.

 -Ingredient Button: Click to create an ingredient.

 -Cuisine Button: Click to create a cuisine type.

 -Meal Button: Click to create a meal type.

Create a Recipe Help

 -Image: Click on the image to open the camera and attach an image to the recipe.

 -Select Difficulty: Set to 'Easy', 'Moderate',, or 'Hard' to indicate difficulty of recipe.

 -Favourite: Set the slider to add or remove the recipe from your favourite recipes.

 -Select Meal Type: Select a meal type to associate to the recipe.

 -Select Cuisine Type: Select a cuisine type to associate to the recipe. 

 -Ingredients: Click the '+' button to add ingredients to the recipe.

 -Instructions: Click the '+' button to add steps to the recipe.

 -Stars: Enter your rating of the recipe on a scale of 1 to 5. 

 -Checkmark Button: Click on the checkmark to save the recipe.

Create or Edit Step Help

 -Enter Instruction Field: Enter the instruction of the step.

 -Estimated Time Field: Enter the estimated time to complete the step. 

 -Save Button: Save the step and return to the recipe associated with the step. 

 -Delete Step: Delete the step from the recipe and return.
